results.title: [Impact of antihypertensive therapy on clinical status and quality of life in patients with initial manifestations of hypertensive encephalopathy].
results.text_hl: AIM: To study the clinical and instrumental characteristics of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertensive_Encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020343 @@@hypertensive encephalopathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypertensive_Encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020343 @@@HE@@@) in early stages, as well as the time course of their changes during long-term antihypertensive therapy (AHT).

citations.NLM: Varakin IuIa, Oshchepkova EV, Gornostaeva GV, Amintaeva AG, Kadykov AV, Kravchenko MA, Prokopovich ME, Manvelov LS, Suslina ZA. [Impact of antihypertensive therapy on clinical status and quality of life in patients with initial manifestations of hypertensive encephalopathy]. Ter Arkh. 2010;82(12):10-5. PMID: 21516731
